ARABIC: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظٌۢ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We know exactly how the earth eats them away. We possess an all-preserving Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We know what the earth consumes of them, for We have the Book that preserves everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Thus do they imagine, although) We know well what the earth takes away from them. With Us is a Record that preserves everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We already know how much of them (of their bodies) the earth will consume. With Us there is a Book that contains all records.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We know all what the earth decreases from them; and with Us is a Book that retains.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We know that which the earth takes of them, and with Us is a Book preserved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We know indeed what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a writing that preserves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We know what the earth diminishes of them; with Us is a book recording.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We know that which the earth taketh of them, and with Us is a recording Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We know very well what the earth takes away from them: We hold a book which records all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely We know that which the earth consumeth of them, and with Us is, Book preserved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We know what the earth diminishes from them, and with Us is a preserving Book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We already know how much of them the earth takes away: With Us is a record guarding (the full account).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We know that which the earth takes of them (their dead bodies), and with Us is a Book preserved (i.e. the Book of Decrees).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We know all that the earth takes away of them, and a Book of Records is with Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We know what the earth consumes of them, and with Us is a comprehensive book.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We know what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a retaining record.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:4] We know what the earth diminishes, consumes, of them, and with Us is a preserving Book, namely, the Preserved Tablet (al-lawh al-mahfūz), which contains everything that has been ordained [by God].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah, Exalted is He, said: (We know that which the earth taketh of them) We know that which the earth devours of their flesh after they die and that which it leaves, (and with Us is a recording Book) and with Us is a Book preserved from Satan. This is the Guarded Tablet wherein is recorded their death, stay in the grave and resurrection on the Day of Judgement.
